chocolateChipCookies.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
chocolateChipCookies.ingredients: 2 cups flour, 1 cup butter, 1 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 2 cups chocolate chips
chocolateChipCookies.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. 2. Mix dry ingredients. 3. Add wet ingredients. 4. Fold in chocolate chips. 5. Bake for 12 minutes.

bananaBread.title: Banana Bread
bananaBread.ingredients: 3 ripe bananas, 2 cups flour, 1 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup butter
bananaBread.instructions: 1. Mash bananas. 2. Mix all ingredients. 3. Pour into loaf pan. 4. Bake at 350°F for 60 minutes.

pastaCarbonara.title: Pasta Carbonara
pastaCarbonara.ingredients: 1 lb pasta, 6 slices bacon, 4 eggs, 1 cup parmesan cheese, black pepper
pastaCarbonara.instructions: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Fry bacon until crispy. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine all ingredients while pasta is hot.

caesarSalad.title: Caesar Salad
caesarSalad.ingredients: 1 head romaine lettuce, 1/2 cup parmesan, 1 cup croutons, Caesar dressing
caesarSalad.instructions: 1. Chop romaine lettuce. 2. Add parmesan and croutons. 3. Toss with Caesar dressing.
